dialog.text: It's December!  I love Christmas :partying_face: all the baubles, the tree and classic films - we always watch Mary Poppins.  Don't you love it too?

joins.text: Glad I'm not the only one :wink:

dialog.text: Thank goodness this semester will be soon - I could do with a break .  I have almost finished my reflections for each learning outcome and then I need to check everything over.  Only 3 days to go.  Do you have any reflections yet to do?

joins.text: Keep going then - we are almost there!

dialog.text: I am trying to follow what Tom said in class, get something down even if its not perfect.  I know I missed out some bits but they can't mark what they don't have so I put some short audio recordings together.  Jeff sent me a text to remind me to download the mapping.csv from the Portal otherwise you will get a zero!
